● Open a zone by either tapping it or holding your 
     finger on it
 ● You can select a letter by tapping the button
 ● You can also select a letter by dragging your finger
     to the button and then dragging your finger to
     select

● You can change regions by sliding your finger over to
     one of the four buttons in the four corners and hold 
     your finger there
 ● Slide you finger off once it has change and the enter 
     the new zone

● Tap select in the center of the screen
 ● Or slide your finger to select and lift your finger off
     the screen
 ● A space will automatically be added to the end of 
     your word

● Tap the EDIT TEXT button on the home screen
 ● You can move the cursor by using the LEFT or RIGHT
     arrow buttons
 ● You can add a SPACE by using the SPACE button
 ● Remove a letter with the DELETE button
 ● You can select any of these options by tapping the
     button
 ● Or by sliding your finger over it
\u25CF Tap the submit button on the home screen\n \u25CF Or slide your finger to it and hold it there\n \u25CF Your sentence will be read out loud
